comments:
I defined a watch expression. I suspect it could not be resolved. Either
because it did not resolve it immediately when I typed it or because
it was simply undefined as I stepped out of the procedure where that
expression was valid. The expression was: e->to()->id(). 
The whole platform came to a screaching stop.
